title: Windows 7 build 7106 _x86_ English pack
description:
This is _ONLY_ for x86.

Ok its semi working, however instalation is bit complicated :)

First of all download pack and extract it in C:.

You need to copy ALL folders to C: and overwrite everything, however it will give you premission problems even if you copy as admin, since lots of files are protected, so what i suggest is to boot it from Win7 english DVD (version doesnt matter), chose repair there and copy from that command prompt with xcopy. If your extracted files are on C:English.7106.x86, when you are on repair command prompt, then you can simply use 1stcopyme.cmd. If they are not and they are for example on D:English.7106.x86, then you need to manualy copy with xcopy, command is "xcopy * D: /S"

Now reboot in to windows, it will still be in chinese, so you run "2ndrunmeasadmin.cmd" as admin doh and apply English.reg in to registry. Reboot and you have 7106 in english ;)

thanks to Viper_zzz for method.
